short_description: This compact, 5-in-1 weather station provides the tools to investigate specific weather phenomena and Earth’s climate system in general.

Install this sleek weather station outdoors and use the built-in wind vane, compass, rain gauge, anemometer (wind speed indicator), and thermometer to measure weather data.
